title: ‘DaVinci and Michelangelo Side by Side’, Cleveland Foundation & Timothy McAllister
teaser: Dee Perry spotlights the new production Discover DaVinci & Michelangelo Side by Side coming to PlayouseSquare Friday night.  Plus, The Cleveland Foundation's Kathleen Cerveny previews the new WVIZ documentary Enduring Trust.  And sax-man Timothy McAllister performs in the Key Bank studio prior to his FREE concerts this week with City Music Cleveland, beginning tonight.
